name: The Red Front
description: December 1941 - The Third Reich has reached Moscow and are preparing the final invasion. In secret, the Soviet army has constructed a super tank which you will pilot.Leading the charge against the invading Nazi's, defend Moscow, crush the Reich and take the fight back to Hitler himself!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 or Later Процессор: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Phenom 9950 Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: HD Graphics 520 DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 500 MB
recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 7 or Later Процессор: Intel Core I5 2500 Оперативная память: 6 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 1050 DirectX: Версии 9.0 Место на диске: 750 MB
